View_Interfaces

Interface ITextTab

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ITab, IView, java.util.Observer
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IProductApplicationTab, IProductEnvironmentTab, ITargetDefinitionTab
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProductApplicationTab, ProductEnvironmentTab, TargetDefinitionTab, TextTab

    public interface ITextTab
extends ITab
    This interface is a specialisation of ITab defining a standard structure of editing a big texts.

    A requirement analysis contains many descriptions which has to be editable. To give such tasks a standard structure all subclasses of this interface are unified on the following points.

    View actions in view
    A text tab provides two different view actions:

    • ViewActions.SAVE - saves the written text in the analysis
    • ViewActions.RESET - resets the current text to the saved text in the analysis
    Controller of views implementing this interface have to listen to these actions.

    Text field
    In addition to the view actions the view provides a big text field in which the user can enter his text. To observe the text changes a ITextController could be added via addTextController(ITextController). It will be notified whenever the text is changed by the user in this view.

    The current implementations of this interface are shown below to give a better overview of the tab structure:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    9045534
    See Also:
    ITab

      Sets the content of the text area to the saved description and deletes changes which the user could have done.
